rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0001
rows.name: Lao-san!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0002
rows.name: Hey...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0003
rows.name:
It can't be...[ST:wide ]—
Everyone on Lao-san's team... they're all...[ST:wide ]—?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Yeah... by the hands of the Growth.
It was my mistake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0005
rows.name: If only we'd arrived sooner...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0006
rows.name: You think they wouldn't have been killed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0007
rows.name: It doesn't matter either way, does it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Once we find the Life Point, they can just
come back as many times as they want, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0009
rows.name: Lao-san[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0010
rows.name: We're the lucky ones, aren't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Even though most of humanity
disappeared along with Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
We got these bodies that can revive over and over,
and we just live on easy street.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0013
rows.name:
If we can't secure the Central Life,
all that luck becomes meaningless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0014
rows.name:
That's enough, Lao.
First priority is getting you treatment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0015
rows.name: Come back to NLA with us for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0016
rows.name: No, I can't.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0017
rows.name:
If the Growth get their hands on the real thing,
it'll be irreversible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0018
rows.name: You guys need to hurry on ahead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0019
rows.name: We can't just leave you behind, Lao-san![ST:wait

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Don't worry about it.
I'll get the Testament guys to pick me up or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0021
rows.name: But[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0022
rows.name: I've transferred the Life Point coordinates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0023
rows.name:
It's north of here.
Sorry, I'm counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0024
rows.name: Understood—we can handle it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Let's hurry. I want to finish the mission
before the Growth find us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0026
rows.name: Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0027
rows.name: Yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0028
rows.name:
It's dangerous ahead, there are lots of Growth.
Wouldn't it be better if you waited somewhere?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0029
rows.name: Thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0029_2
rows.name: But[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0030
rows.name: I'm going with Elma-san and everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0031
rows.name:
If the area ahead is dangerous,
that's all the more reason I have to try harder than ever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0032
rows.name: I want to be more helpful to everyone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0033
rows.name:
Thank you
for worrying about me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Even them... they just lose their B.B.
It's not like they actually die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09050100_MSG0035
rows.name: No need to worry about it.[ST:wait ]
